data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Narita, João P. Z., De, Gilberto J., Fernando, Liyanage C. P. (2011): Two species of Neocypholaelaps from Sri Lanka (Acari: Ameroseiidae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 2741: 59-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276591
